data.name: How Fish Is Made
data.detailed_description:
HOW FISH IS MADE is a short narrative-driven experience about talking to fish and making choices.



You are a sardine in a machine, but is life that simple? This place imposes on you and your fellow fish a prophetic choice. Will you help them, or lead them astray? Will they do the same to you?



Live through the ultimate power fantasy of being a sardine. Make oily friends, become upset, and choose your destiny.

The sardines look just like the real thing, so you can really believe they have emotions. Guaranteed!




Developed by students as part of the FutureGames education in Sweden.

  • Johanna Kasurinen (@byKASURAGA)
  • Jeffrey Tomec (@Jeffrey_Tomec)
  • Martin Halldin (@siarate)

Features the original song "Little Lily Swing" by Tri-Tachyon

ALL MUSIC IN THIS GAME IS STREAMING AND YOUTUBE SAFE.



WARNING! The game contains:
- TRYPOPHOBIA inducing imagery.
- Potentially disturbing subject matters.

data.short_description: Are sardines trustworthy? Are you? Do you want to be?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: There is some graphic fish violence, trypophobia inducing imagery, and just a pinch of cum.
